selector.list=.w-dyn-items#{{listId}}
itemsPerPage={{per}}

selector.host=[data-wu="breadcrumbs"]
homeLabel={{homeLabel}}

[components.filter]
selector.scope={{scope}}
keys={{keys}}

[components.sort]
selector.list=#{{listId}}

[components.loadmore]
selector.list=#{{listId}}
initial={{initial}}
step={{step}}

[components.toc]
selector.host=[data-wu="toc"]
for={{forSel}}
headings={{headings}}

[components.external_links]
selector.host=[data-wu="ext-links"]

[components.form_guard]
selector.host=[data-wu="form-guard"]
timeout={{timeout}}
label={{sending}}

[components.utm_capture]
selector.host=[data-wu="utm"]

[components.video_auto]
selector.host=[data-wu="video"]

[components.scrollspy]
selector.nav=[data-wu="scrollspy"]

[components.trim]
